name: Amy Sparks: The Twin Towers
description:
This is the prologue for my upcoming game "Amy Sparks: The Twin Towers", serving as an introduction to the storyline.

My submission for the Narrative Game Jam 2023!

Please use one of the download options if you can - I have provided a web playable version as a fallback, but it will suffer from image load time delays, and may be lacking sound effects.

The prologue is in "visual novel style", the actual game will be a 3D action adventure, though. I plan to produce separate gameplay trailers and playable demos in the future, so stay tuned!

Please like, comment, follow, and share! We all know how much time, energy and devotion goes into making a game, so every bit of feedback, love, and support is greatly appreciated! There's still a marathon ahead of me. Thank you <3
